bio.p: Pete Vanden Bosch is an adjunct professor at Marymount University and Northern Virginia Community College. He’s a retired Air Force officer, spending most of that career as an operations analyst. He also performed studies for Department of Homeland Security for several years. His current research interests are in educational psychology.
